description.english: You collected 20 Shards of Amulah!
description.german: Du hast 20 Splitter von Amulah gesammelt!
description.french: Vous avez collecté 20 Éclats d'Amulah !
description.italian: Hai collezionato 20 Frammenti di Amulah!
description.brazilian: Você coletou 20 Fragmentos de Amulah!
description.schinese: 你收集了20块阿姆拉碎片！
description.japanese: アムラのかけら20個を集めました！

description.english: You collected 50 Shards of Amulah!
description.brazilian: Você coletou 50 Fragmentos de Amulah!
description.french: Vous avez collecté 50 Éclats d'Amulah !
description.german: Du hast 50 Splitter von Amulah gesammelt!
description.italian: Hai collezionato 50 Frammenti di Amulah!
description.schinese: 你收集了50块阿姆拉碎片！
description.japanese: アムラのかけら50個を集めました！

description.english: You collected all 90 Shards of Amulah!
description.german: Du hast alle 90 Splitter von Amulah gesammelt!
description.french: Vous avez collecté tous les 90 Éclats d'Amulah !
description.italian: Hai collezionato tutti i 90 Frammenti di Amulah!
description.spanish: ¡Has recolectado todos los 90 Fragmentos de Amulah!
description.brazilian: Você coletou todos os 90 Fragmentos de Amulah!
description.schinese: 你收集了全部90块阿姆拉碎片！
description.japanese: アムラのかけら90個を集めました！

description.english: You collected 8 Orbs of Amulah! (Orbs created from shards doesn't count)
description.brazilian: Você coletou 8 Orbes de Amulah! (Orbes criados a partir de fragmentos não contam)
description.french: Vous avez collecté 8 Orbes d'Amulah ! (Les orbes créés à partir des éclats ne comptent pas)
description.german: Du hast 8 Kugeln von Amulah gesammelt! (Kugeln, die aus Splittern erstellt wurden, zählen nicht)
description.italian: Hai collezionato 8 Orb di Amulah! (Gli orb creati dai frammenti non contano)
description.spanish: ¡Has recolectado 8 Orbes de Amulah! (Los orbes creados a partir de fragmentos no cuentan)
description.schinese: 你收集了8个阿姆拉球！（碎片合成的球不计入在内）
description.japanese: アムラのオーブ8個を集めました！（かけらから作られたオーブは含まれません）
description.koreana: 아물라의 구슬 8개를 모았습니다! (조각들로 만든 구슬은 제외합니다)

description.english: You collected all 19 Orbs of Amulah! (Orbs created from shards doesn't count)
description.german: Du hast alle 19 Kugeln von Amulah gesammelt! (Kugeln, die aus Splittern erstellt wurden, zählen nicht)
description.french: Vous avez collecté tous les 19 Orbes d'Amulah ! (Les orbes créés à partir des éclats ne comptent pas)
description.italian: Hai collezionato tutti i 19 Orb di Amulah! (Gli orb creati dai frammenti non contano)
description.spanish: ¡Has recolectado todos los 19 Orbes de Amulah! (Los orbes creados a partir de fragmentos no cuentan)
description.brazilian: Você coletou todos os 19 Orbes de Amulah! (Orbes criados a partir de fragmentos não contam)
description.schinese: 你收集了全部19个阿姆拉球！（碎片合成的球不计入在内）
description.japanese: アムラのオーブ19個をすべて集めました！（かけらから作られたオーブは含まれません）
description.koreana: 아물라의 구슬 19개를 모두 모았습니다! (조각들로 만든 구슬은 제외합니다)

description.english: You collected 25 golden coins!
description.german: Du hast 25 Goldmünzen gesammelt!
description.french: Vous avez collecté 25 pièces d'or !
description.italian: Hai collezionato 25 monete d'oro!
description.brazilian: Você coletou 25 moedas de ouro!
description.japanese: 金貨25枚を集めました！

description.english: You collected all 50 golden coins!
description.german: Du hast alle 50 Goldmünzen gesammelt!
description.french: Vous avez collecté toutes les 50 pièces d'or !
description.italian: Hai collezionato tutte le 50 monete d'oro!
description.spanish: ¡Has recolectado todas las 50 monedas de oro!
description.brazilian: Você coletou todas as 50 moedas de ouro!
description.japanese: 金貨50枚をすべて集めました！

description.english: You found 10 of the runaway chickens!
description.german: Du hast 10 der entlaufenen Hühner gefunden!
description.french: Vous avez trouvé 10 des poules en fuite !
description.italian: Hai trovato 10 dei polli in fuga!
description.brazilian: Você encontrou 10 das galinhas fugitivas!
description.japanese: 逃げたニワトリ10羽を見つけました！

description.english: You found all 20 runaway chickens!
description.german: Du hast alle 20 entlaufenen Hühner gefunden!
description.french: Vous avez trouvé toutes les 20 poules en fuite !
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti i 20 polli in fuga!
description.brazilian: Você encontrou todas as 20 galinhas fugitivas!
description.schinese: 你找到了全部20只逃跑的鸡！
description.japanese: 逃げたニワトリ20羽をすべて見つけました！

displayName.japanese: すべてのハートをアップグレード

description.english: You have become as healthy as you can possibly become!
description.german: Du bist so gesund wie möglich geworden!
description.french: Vous êtes devenu aussi en forme que possible !
description.italian: Sei diventato/a sano/a quanto possibile!
description.spanish: ¡Te has vuelto tan saludable como puedes ser!
description.brazilian: Você se tornou tão saudável quanto possível!
description.schinese: 你已达到最健康的状态！
description.japanese: これ以上ないほど健康になりました！

displayName.japanese: すべてのダメージをアップグレード

description.english: You have become as strong as you can possibly become!
description.german: Du bist so stark wie möglich geworden!
description.french: Vous êtes devenu aussi fort que possible !
description.italian: Sei diventato/a forte quanto possibile!
description.spanish: ¡Te has vuelto tan fuerte como puedes ser!
description.brazilian: Você se tornou tão forte quanto possível!
description.japanese: これ以上ないほど強くなりました！

displayName.japanese: すべてのスピードをアップグレード

description.english: You have become as quick as you can possibly become!
description.german: Du bist so schnell wie möglich geworden!
description.french: Vous êtes devenu aussi rapide que possible !
description.italian: Sei diventato/a veloce quanto possibile!
description.spanish: ¡Te has vuelto tan rápido como puedes ser!
description.brazilian: Você se tornou tão rápido quanto possível!
description.japanese: これ以上ないほど速くなりました！

description.english: The blacksmith has upgraded your Sword!
description.german: Der Schmied hat dein Schwert aufgerüstet!
description.french: Le forgeron a amélioré votre épée !
description.italian: Il fabbro ha potenziato la tua spada!
description.brazilian: O ferreiro melhorou sua espada!
description.japanese: 鍛冶屋が剣をアップグレードしました！

displayName.japanese: グラップリングフックのアップグレード

description.english: The blacksmith has upgraded your Grappling Hook!
description.german: Der Schmied hat deinen Enterhaken aufgerüstet!
description.french: Le forgeron a amélioré votre Crochet de Grappin !
description.italian: Il fabbro ha potenziato il tuo gancio di aggancio!
description.spanish: ¡El herrero ha mejorado tu gancho de agarre!
description.brazilian: O ferreiro melhorou seu Gancho de Escalada!
description.schinese: 铁匠已升级你的飞爪钩！
description.japanese: 鍛冶屋がグラップリングフックをアップグレードしました！

displayName.japanese: 爆弾のアップグレード

description.english: The blacksmith has upgraded your Bombs!
description.german: Der Schmied hat deine Bomben aufgerüstet!
description.french: Le forgeron a amélioré vos bombes !
description.italian: Il fabbro ha potenziato le tue bombe!
description.brazilian: O ferreiro melhorou suas bombas!
description.japanese: 鍛冶屋が爆弾をアップグレードしました！

description.english: You defeated the first boss!
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o primeiro chefe!
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le premier boss !
description.german: Du hast den ersten Boss besiegt!
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il primo boss!
description.japanese: 最初のボスを倒しました！

description.english: You defeated the second boss!
description.german: Du hast den zweiten Boss besiegt!
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le deuxième boss !
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il secondo boss!
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o segundo chefe!
description.japanese: 2番目のボスを倒しました！

description.english: You defeated the third boss!
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o terceiro chefe!
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le troisième boss !
description.german: Du hast den dritten Boss besiegt!
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il terzo boss!
description.japanese: 3番目のボスを倒しました！

description.english: You defeated the fourth boss!
description.german: Du hast den vierten Boss besiegt!
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le quatrième boss !
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il quarto boss!
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o quarto chefe!
description.japanese: 4番目のボスを倒しました！

description.english: You defeated the fifth boss!
description.german: Du hast den fünften Boss besiegt!
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le cinquième boss !
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il quinto boss!
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o quinto chefe!
description.japanese: 5番目のボスを倒しました！

description.english: You defeated the sixth boss!
description.german: Du hast den sechsten Boss besiegt!
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le sixième boss !
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il sesto boss!
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o sexto chefe!
description.japanese: 6番目のボスを倒しました！

description.english: You defeated the final boss! Well done!
description.german: Du hast den letzten Boss besiegt! Gut gemacht!
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le boss final ! Félicitations !
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il boss finale! Ben fatto!
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o chefe final! Parabéns!
description.japanese: 最後のボスを倒しました！お見事！

description.english: You defeated the sand castle boss!
description.german: Du hast den Sandburg-Boss besiegt!
description.french: Tu as vaincu le boss du château de sable !
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il boss del castello di sabbia!
description.spanish: ¡Has derrotado al jefe del castillo de arena!
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o chefe do castelo de areia!
description.japanese: 砂の城のボスを倒しました！

displayName.japanese: クレーンゲームの達人

description.english: You won at the crane game!
description.german: Du hast beim Kran-Spiel gewonnen!
description.french: Tu as gagné au jeu de la grue !
description.italian: Hai vinto al gioco della gru!
description.spanish: ¡Ganaste en el juego de la grúa!
description.brazilian: Você venceu no jogo do guindaste!
description.schinese: 你赢得了吊机游戏的胜利！
description.japanese: クレーンゲームに勝利しました！

displayName.spanish: Maestro del Carrito de la Mina

description.english: You completed all of the minecart challenges!
description.german: Du hast alle Minenwagen-Herausforderungen gemeistert!
description.french: Tu as complété tous les défis du chariot de mine !
description.italian: Hai completato tutti i challenge del carrello di miniera!
description.spanish: ¡Completaste todos los desafíos del carrito de la mina!
description.brazilian: Você completou todos os desafios do carrinho de mina!
description.schinese: 你完成了所有矿车挑战！
description.japanese: すべてのトロッコチャレンジをクリアしました！

description.english: You caught and handed in all fish with a gold star rating!
description.german: Du hast alle Fische mit einer Goldstern-Bewertung gefangen und abgegeben!
description.french: Vous avez attrapé et remis tous les poissons avec une note d'étoile dorée !
description.italian: Hai catturato e consegnato tutti i pesci con una valutazione a stella dorata!
description.spanish: ¡Has atrapado y entregado todos los peces con una calificación de estrella dorada!
description.brazilian: Você pegou e entregou todos os peixes com classificação de estrela dourada!
description.schinese: 你捕获并上交了所有金星级别的鱼！
description.japanese: 金星評価の魚をすべて釣って提出しました！
description.koreana: 금별 등급의 모든 물고기를 잡아 제출했습니다!

displayName.japanese: すべてのテレポーター

description.english: You activated all teleporters!
description.german: Du hast alle Teleporter aktiviert!
description.french: Vous avez activé tous les téléporteurs !
description.italian: Hai attivato tutti i teletrasportatori!
description.brazilian: Você ativou todos os teleportadores!
description.japanese: すべてのテレポーターを起動しました！
